item.title: Costco recalls Ahi Tuna Wasabi Poke in 30+ states over listeria risk
item.description: Costco has recalled more than 3,000 pounds of its Kirkland Signature Ahi Tuna Wasabi Poke after testing found a risk of listeria contamination.
